PROFILE  
 
Having six years of sales experience and over seven  years within the Life Sciences sector I have developed my skill 
set accordingly in order to approach new customers effectively and maintain existing relationships successfully. 
My goal is to always listen to proper ly understand my customers’ needs and not just responding to their queries. 
Having a flexible approach allows me to be as efficient as can be while at the same time ensures that a positive 
and solid business relationship is constructed with them.  
 
 
Main skills:  
Customer oriented attitude  Excellent communication skills  
Attention to detail , analytical  Multitask ing management  
Key account management  Sales metric and goal focused  
New business development  Profit control  
Self-starter and initiator  Team player  
 
 
CAREER HISTORY      
  
Camlab Ltd.  
(January 201 8 – Present ) 
Position:  Technical s ales specialist  
Duties involve:  
▪ Customer relationship management  
▪ Business development  
▪ Customer approach strategy  
▪ Product Management  
▪ Pipeline management  
▪ Enhancing Camlab’s presence in a wide variety of customers across different sectors  
▪ Offer before and after sales technical advice to customers   
▪ Actively engaging with key suppliers to build and maintain strong relationships  
▪ Continuo usly enhancing product knowledge over training and learning about new market trends  
 
PALL Life Sciences  
(January 2015 – 2018 ) 
Position : Sales specialist  
Duties involve d: 
▪ Sales leads generation  
▪ Building key relationships to gain business advantage  
 
▪ Sales data interpretation and analysis  
▪ Provide field -based  sales support in accordance with sales strategy  
▪ Offer  technical support and market knowledge to  Pall colleagues  
▪ Complete and submit contact analysis reports  
▪ Promote new products in accordance with sales and marketing strategy  
▪ Provide price support to our distributor channels  
 
 
Thermo Fisher Scientific   
(December 2013 – December 2014 ) 
Position held: Customer Service Specialist – Product Support  
Duties involved:  
▪ Perform within/beyond set KPI's  
▪ Proactively expand technical knowledge of the business  
▪ Precise and in time response to customers  
▪ Taking responsibility of customer enquiries  
▪ Complaints handling and following up  
▪ Certification issuing for products  
▪ Consumables and Life Science centered but dealing with other areas occasionally  
▪ Offering training to colleagues where necessary  
▪ Managing the e -mail queue and allocating enquiries where appropriate  
 
 
Hellenic Telecommunications Organization S.A. (OTE)  
(March 2012 - August 2012)  
Position held:  Technical assistant , customer service and troubleshooting  
Duties involved:   
▪ Rapid understanding of the customer's problematic situation  
▪ Very good performance under pressure  
▪ Acting as an active member of a team  
▪ Quick responding within strict time limits  
▪ Complaints handling  
▪ Constantly building technical knowledge within all business areas
